content.raw:
It appears that FPS slows down when there are a lot of GUI events (clicking, button presses, etc.)

1. Max: 30.2. Resting rate appears to be 30. Lowest value I saw was 19. Gui appears responsive, though right clicking is sometimes slow (don't know if that's related to the render rate though).
Stereo works, gives me a bit of a headache.

2. Max: 62.5, resting rate appears to be 60. Lowest value I saw was 7 (!) when I clicked on an object repeatedly. Stereo works, though my eyes feel a bit out of focus, and it still gives me a headache. Gui is mostly responsive, but occasionally drops events.

3. Varies wildly from 6 to 40. GUI is comparatively very choppy. Stereo doesn't seem much worse than 2, however.
content.html:
It appears that FPS slows down when there are a lot of GUI events (clicking, button presses, etc.)

  1. Max: 30.2. Resting rate appears to be 30. Lowest value I saw was 19. Gui appears responsive, though right clicking is sometimes slow (don't know if that's related to the render rate though). Stereo works, gives me a bit of a headache.

  2. Max: 62.5, resting rate appears to be 60. Lowest value I saw was 7 (!) when I clicked on an object repeatedly. Stereo works, though my eyes feel a bit out of focus, and it still gives me a headache. Gui is mostly responsive, but occasionally drops events.

  3. Varies wildly from 6 to 40. GUI is comparatively very choppy. Stereo doesn't seem much worse than 2, however.
